Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to add current tab to Reading List

'After 1 hour' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 1 minute' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 5 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 10 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 15 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
Label used as a setting item and title of the following screen to change the current passcode
Title of the dialog used to request the passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Text displayed above the input field when entering a new passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
'Immediately' interval item for selecting when to require passcode

trans-unit.target: Forkert adgangskode. Prøv igen (%d forsøg tilbage).
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app with attempts remaining
Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antal forsøg nået. Forsøg igen om en time.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antal forsøg nået. Forsøg igen senere.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.source: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.target: Den nye adgangskode skal være anderledes end den gamle.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user tries to enter the same passcode as their existing code when changing it.
Label for the Passcode item in Settings

trans-unit.target: Adgangskoderne var ikke ens. Prøv igen.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed to user when their confirming passcode doesn't match the first code.
Text displayed above the input field when confirming a passcode
Text displayed in the 'Interval' section, followed by the current interval setting, e.g. 'Immediately'
Title of the dialog used to set a passcode
Label for the Touch ID/Passcode item in Settings
Label used as a setting item to turn off passcode
Label used as a setting item to turn on passcode
Touch ID prompt subtitle when turning off passcode
List section title for when to use Touch ID

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.target: Brug dit fingeraftryk til at få adgang til logins.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing logins

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.target: Brug dit fingeraftryk for at få adgang til privat browsing.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing private browsing

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to disable Touch ID.
trans-unit.target: Brug dit fingeraftryk til at deaktivere Touch ID.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when disabling Touch ID

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access configuring your required passcode interval.
trans-unit.target: Brug dit fingeraftryk til at konfigurere dit adgangskode-interval.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing the require passcode setting
Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.
The folder name for the virtual folder that contains all desktop bookmarks.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.target: Er du sikker på, at du vil slette mappen og dens indhold?
trans-unit.note: Main body of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
Button label to cancel deletion when the user tried to delete a non-empty folder.
Button label for the button that deletes a folder and all of its children.
Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
The cancel button when confirming clear history.
The button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Historikken vil blive fjernet fra alle dine forbundne enheder. Denne handling kan ikke fortrydes.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.
The confirmation button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.source: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.target: Denne handling rydder alle dine private data, inklusiv historik fra dine synkroniserede enheder.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.target: Er du sikker på, at du vil rydde alle dine data? Dette vil også lukke alle åbne faneblade.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in the dialog prompting users if they want to clear everything
Settings item for clearing browsing history
Settings item for clearing the cache
Used as a button label in the dialog to cancel clear private data dialog
Used as a button label in the dialog to Clear private data dialog
Title of the Clear private data dialog.
Button in settings that clears private data for the selected items. Navigation title in settings.
Settings item for clearing cookies
Settings item for clearing website data
Settings item for clearing passwords and login data
The cancel button when confirming clear private data.
The button that clears private data.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?

trans-unit.target: Kunne ikke føje side til læseliste. Måske er den der allerede?

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password for %@ on %@?

The label of the button the user will press to reject the option to open a file in another application
The label of the button the user will press to be presented with a list of other apps to open a file in

trans-unit.source: Firefox is unable to download or display this file. Would you like to open it in another app?

The title of the alert box asking the user if they want to use another app to open a file.

trans-unit.source: Downloads aren't supported in Firefox yet.

trans-unit.target: Indtast din adgangskode for at forbinde.

Label for button to perform advanced actions on the error page

trans-unit.source: Warning: we can't confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: Advarsel: Vi kan ikke bekræfte, at din forbindelse til dette websted er sikker.
trans-unit.note: Warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: It may be a misconfiguration or tampering by an attacker. Proceed if you accept the potential risk.
trans-unit.target: Det kan skyldes en forkert opsætning eller at nogen manipulerer din forbindelse. Fortsæt kun, hvis du kan accepterer den mulige risiko.
trans-unit.note: Additional warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: The owner of %@ has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.
trans-unit.target: Ejeren af %@ har opsat sit websted forkert. Firefox har ikke oprettet forbindelse til webstedet for at forhindre, at dine informationer bliver stjålet.

trans-unit.target: Gem sider til din læseliste ved at trykke på bog-plus-ikonet blandt læsevisningsknapperne.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1LXbDOL
Navigation title for search settings. Open search section of settings
The text shown in the URL bar on about:home

trans-unit.source: The new search engine will appear in the quick search bar.
trans-unit.target: Den nye søgetjeneste vil blive vist i linjen "Hurtig søgning"
trans-unit.note: The message that asks the user to Add the search provider explaining where the search engine will appear
The success message that appears after a user sucessfully adds a new search engine
The title that asks the user to Add the search provider
The cancel button if you do not want to add a search engine.

trans-unit.source: The search provider could not be added.
trans-unit.note: A title explaining that we failed to add a search engine
A title explaining that we failed to add a search engine
The confirmation button
Accessibility hint describing the action performed when a search suggestion is clicked
Accessibility label for the lock icon, which is only present if the connection is secure
Menu item in settings used to open input.mozilla.org where people can submit feedback
Used as a button label for crash dialog prompt

trans-unit.id: Send a crash report so Mozilla can fix the problem?
trans-unit.source: Send a crash report so Mozilla can fix the problem?
trans-unit.target: Vil du sende en fejlrapport, så Mozilla kan løse problemet?
trans-unit.note: Message displayed in the crash dialog above the buttons used to select when sending reports
Button title for cancelling SendTo screen

trans-unit.source: Only HTTP and HTTPS links can be shared.
trans-unit.target: Det er kun muligt at dele HTTP- og HTTPS-links.
trans-unit.note: Message in error prompt explaining why the URL is invalid.
OK button to dismiss the error prompt.

trans-unit.source: The link you are trying to share cannot be shared.
trans-unit.target: Linket, du forsøger at dele, kan ikke deles.
trans-unit.note: Title of error prompt displayed when an invalid URL is shared.
Sepia theme setting in Reading View settings
Font type setting in the reading view settings
Accessibility label for the Settings button in the Tab Tray. Settings
Button in settings that clears private data for the selected items.
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog prompting the user to make sure they want to clear all of their private data.
Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Button in settings to clear the home page.
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog to configure the home page and its uses.
Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Label displayed under the 'Show Homepage Icon In Menu' option. It describes the effect of this setting when disabled.
Label used as an item in Settings. User can toggle this setting to show the home page button in menu, or on toolbar.
Placeholder text in the homepage setting when no homepage has been set.
Title of the setting section containing the URL of the current home page.
Button in settings to use the current link on the clipboard as home page.
Button in settings to use the current page as home page.
Button in settings to use the default home page. If no default is set, then this button isn't shown.

trans-unit.source: When you open a New Tab:
trans-unit.target: Når du åbner et nyt faneblad:
trans-unit.note: A description in settings of what the new tab choice means
Option in settings to show a blank page when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show bookmarks when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show history when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show your homepage when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show reading list when you open a new tab
Option in settings to show top sites when you open a new tab
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog to configure the new tab behaviour.
Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Button displayed at the top of the search settings.
Button displayed at the top of the search settings.
Title of link to help page to find out how to solve Sync issues
Accessibility Label for the tab toolbar Share button
Context menu item for sharing a link URL
Button title for cancelling Share screen
Label for show search suggestions setting.
Accessibility label for the tabs button in the (top) tab toolbar Accessibility Label for the tabs button in the tab toolbar
Show the on-boarding screen again from the settings
Label for show search suggestions setting.
Text message / button in the settings table view
See http://mzl.la/1Qtkf0j Text message / button in the settings table view

trans-unit.id: Sign in to get your tabs, bookmarks, and passwords from your other devices.
trans-unit.source: Sign in to get your tabs, bookmarks, and passwords from your other devices.
trans-unit.target: Log ind for at få adgang til faneblade, bogmærker og adgangskoder fra dine andre enheder.
trans-unit.note: Clarify value prop under Sign In to Firefox in Settings.
Accessibility Label for the tab toolbar Stop button
Support section title

trans-unit.id: Swipe right or left with three fingers to close the tab.
trans-unit.source: Swipe right or left with three fingers to close the tab.
trans-unit.target: Stryg til højre eller venstre med tre fingre for at lukke fanebladet.
trans-unit.note: Accessibility hint for tab tray's displayed tab.
Sync Firefox Account

trans-unit.id: Sync your tabs, bookmarks, passwords and more.
trans-unit.source: Sync your tabs, bookmarks, passwords and more.
trans-unit.target: Synkronisér dine faneblade, bogmærker, adgangskoder m.m.
trans-unit.note: Text displayed when the Sync home panel is empty, describing the features provided by Sync to invite the user to log in.

trans-unit.id: Sync your tabs, passwords and more.
trans-unit.source: Sync your tabs, passwords and more.
trans-unit.target: Synkroniser dine faneblade, adgangskoder og mere.
trans-unit.note: Text displayed when the Sync home panel is empty, describing the features provided by Sync to invite the user to log in.

trans-unit.source: Your first sync may take a while
trans-unit.target: Din første synkronisering kan tage et stykke tid
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the user syncs for the first time
Message displayed when the user's account is syncing with no ellipsis
Message displayed when the user's account is syncing with ellipsis at the end
The Bookmark sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
The Remote Clients sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when synchronization failed to complete
The History sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
The Logins sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed to start.
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed due to being offline

trans-unit.target: Sync har problemer med at synkronisere %@
trans-unit.note: Title for Sync status message when a component of Sync failed to complete, where %@ represents the name of the component, i.e. Sync is experiencing issues syncing Bookmarks
The Tabs sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.
Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.
The button to undo the delete all tabs
The label indicating that all the tabs were closed

trans-unit.id: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.source: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.target: Siden kunne ikke vises i læsevisning.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the reader mode page could not be loaded. This message will appear only when sharing to Firefox reader mode from another app.

trans-unit.id: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.source: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.target: Der er en ny version af Firefox Aurora tilgængelig. Tryk på OK for at gå til download-siden
trans-unit.note: Prompt message for application update

trans-unit.id: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.source: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.target: Der opstod et problem med at tilgå faneblade fra dine andre enheder. Prøv igen om et øjeblik.
trans-unit.note: Error message in the remote tabs panel

trans-unit.id: There was an error converting the page
trans-unit.source: There was an error converting the page
trans-unit.target: Der opstod en fejl, da siden skulle konverteres
trans-unit.note: Error displayed when reader mode cannot be enabled

trans-unit.id: This allows you to save the image to your Camera Roll.
trans-unit.source: This allows you to save the image to your Camera Roll.
trans-unit.target: Dette lader dig gemme billedet på din kamerarulle.

trans-unit.id: This will open in another application

trans-unit.target: Indholdet åbnes i en anden app
trans-unit.note: Opening an external app
History tableview section header
Accessibility label for the Menu button.
Accessibility Label for the tab toolbar Homepage button
Panel accessibility label

trans-unit.source: Your most visited sites will show up here.

Button shown in editing mode to remove this site from the top sites panel.

Button to update the user's password
Text message in the settings table view
Setting to enable compact tabs in the tab overview
Username textbox in Authentication prompt
Text message in the settings table view
Version number of Firefox shown in settings

Relative time for a tab that was visited within the last few moments.

Relative date for dates older than a month and less than two months.
Description for a date more than a week ago, but less than a month ago.
Accessibility label for read article in reading list. It's a past participle - functions as an adjective.
Relative date for date in past week.
Relative date for date older than a minute.
Accessibility label for unread article in reading list. It's a past participle - functions as an adjective.
Relative date for yesterday.

Prompt option for cancelling out of deletion
Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the user taps the close button in the search field to clear the search and exit search mode

Label for the button used to delete the current login.
Label for the button used to deselect all logins.
Accessibility label for entering search mode for logins
Hide password text selection menu item
Footer label describing when the current login was last modified with the timestamp as the parameter.
Title for Logins List View screen.
Prompt message warning the user that deleting non-synced logins will permanently remove them

trans-unit.id: Logins will be removed from all connected devices.
trans-unit.source: Logins will be removed from all connected devices.
trans-unit.target: Logins vil blive fjernet fra alle forbundne enheder.
trans-unit.note: Prompt message warning the user that deleted logins will remove logins from all connected devices
Label displayed when no logins are found after searching.
Open and Fill website text selection menu item
Reveal password text selection menu item
Title for the search field at the top of the Logins list screen
Accessibility label for the search input field in the Logins list
Label for the button used to select all logins.
Label displayed above the password row in Login Detail View.
Label displayed above the username row in Login Detail View.
Label displayed above the website row in Login Detail View.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to create a bookmark for the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to close all tabs currently open.
Accessibility label describing the button that closes the menu when open
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the toolbar to search for text within the current page.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open a new private tab.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open a new tab
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Bbookmarks home panel.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the History home panel.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to navigate to the home page.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Reading list home panel.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Settings menu.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Top Sites home panel.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to delete an existing bookmark for the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the share dialog.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to set the homepage if none is currently set.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to request the desktop version of the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to request the mobile version of the current website.
Setting for closing private tabs

trans-unit.id: Firefox won't remember any of your history or cookies, but new bookmarks will be saved.
trans-unit.source: Firefox won't remember any of your history or cookies, but new bookmarks will be saved.
trans-unit.target: Firefox gemmer ikke din historik eller cookies, men nye bogmærker vil blive gemt.

Toggled OFF accessibility value
Toggled ON accessibility value

Title displayed for when there are no open tabs while in private mode

trans-unit.target: Slår privat tilstand til eller fra

Will be displayed in Settings under 'Close Private Tabs'
Label for search engine buttons. The argument corresponds to the name of the search engine.
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.
Label for search settings button.

Accessibility label for image of default search engine displayed left to the actual search suggestions from the engine. The parameter substituted for \"%@\" is the name of the search engine. E.g.: Search suggestions from Google
Prompt shown before enabling provider search queries
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.

See http://bit.ly/1SmEXU1

Navigation bar button to Send the current page to a device
Title of the dialog that allows you to send a tab to a different device

trans-unit.id: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.source: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.target: Du er ikke logget ind på din Firefox-konto.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1ISlXnU

trans-unit.id: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.source: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.target: Du har ikke andre enheder forbundet til denne Firefox-konto, der kan synkroniseres.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown in the remote tabs panel
Add button in the share dialog
On/off toggle to select adding this url to your bookmarks
On/off toggle to select adding this url to your reading list
Go to link on clipboard
New Private Tab button label
New Tab button label
A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.
The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.
The default name for bookmark folders without titles. The default name for bookmark nodes without titles.
